titleStmt.title: The seuen stars are ye angels of ye seuen churches and ye seuen golden candlesticks which thou servest are ye seuen churches. Reuelation chap:1. v. 20.
titleStmt.author: Gribelin, Simon, 1661 or 2-1733, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by P. Vansomer, in newport street near leicester-fields,

notesStmt.note: Totally engraved, with English and French on either side of illustration.
At foot: S. Gribelin inv: et sculps:.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
